LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Individual sterile pediatric set
Sterile antimicrobial calcium alginate coating 100 % alginate composed of 60 % manuric acid and 40 % glucuronic acid with silver ions 5 x 5cm, allowed deviation +/- 5 %
Sterile antimicrobial calcium alginate coating 100 % alginate composed of 60 % manuric acid and 40 % glucuronic acid with silver ions 10 x 10cm, allowed deviation +/- 5 %
Sterile antimicrobial calcium alginate coating 100 % alginate composed of 60 % manuric acid and 40 % glucuronic acid with silver ions 10 x 20cm, allowed deviation +/- 5 %
Sterile antimicrobial calcium alginate tamponade 100 % alginate composed of 60 % manuric acid and 40 % glucuronic acid with silver ions 30cm 2g, allowed deviation +/- 5 %
Sterile hydro balance cellulose postoperative coating composed of cellulose, water, and 0.085 % chlorhexidine gluconate 5 x 5 cm, allowed deviation +/- 5 %

Sterile hydro balance cellulose postoperative coating with PHMB (polyhexamethylene biguanide composition: cellulose, water, polyhexamethylene biguanide (phmb) and 0.085 % chlorhexidine gluconate 5 х 5cm, allowed deviation +/- 5 %

Sterile hydro balance cellulose postoperative coating with PHMB (polyhexamethylene biguanide composition: cellulose, water, polyhexamethylene biguanide (phmb) and 0.085 % chlorhexidine gluconate 9 х 9cm, allowed deviation +/- 5 %

Styrene, transparent, waterproof, adhesive bandage made of fliselin, 100 % polyester, high viscose rayon and polyester, and polyethylene layer that is in contact with the wound 10 x 8 cm with a cushion 6x4cm, allowed deviation +/- 5 %

Styrene, transparent, waterproof, adhesive bandage made of fliselin, 100 % polyester, high viscose rayon and polyester, and polyethylene layer in contact with wound 10 x 15 cm with 5 x 11cm cushion, tolerance +/- 5 %
Amorphous hydro gel, sterile, in a syringe weighing a maximum of 6 grams of gel in the syringe
Amorphous hydro gel, sterile, in a syringe weighing a maximum of 6 grams of gel in the syringe
Collagen with a porous structure with high capillary absorption power and formation of granulation tissue 6 x 8 x 0.8cm +/- 5 %

Sterile, Adhesive bandage made of fliselin, 100 % polyester, high viscose rayon and polyester pad, and polyethylene layer in contact with wound 10 x 8 cm with 6 x 4cm cushion, allowed deviation +/- 5 %

Styrene, Adhesive bandage made of fliselin, 100 % polyester, high viscose rayon and polyester pad, and polyethylene layer in contact with wound 10 x 15 cm with 5 x 11cm cushion, allowed deviation +/- 5 %
Gypsum 17 tonite bandage made of alpha and beta gypsum 7.5cm, with a minimum length of 3m, fast-setting with a hardening time of 3 to 4 minutes, a plaster mass of M2 550 + -75 grams
Gypsum 17 tonite bandage made of alpha and beta gypsum 10cm, with a minimum length of 3m, fast-setting with a hardening time of 3 to 4 minutes, a plaster mass of M2 550 + -75 grams
Gypsum 17 tonite bandage made of alpha and beta gypsum 12cm, with a minimum length of 3m, fast-setting with a hardening time of 3 to 4 minutes, a plaster mass of M2 550 + -75 grams

Binding set No.1 made of blanket 60 x 90cm +/- 5 % combination of fliselin wadding and polyethylene coating film, gas 10 x 10cm +/- 5 % 17 nit min. 8 layer 20 pieces, petroleum jade polyester fiber impregnated with a layer containing polymer matrix, petroleum jelly and hydrocolloid 10 × 10 cm +/- 5 %

Set of bandage no.2 made of cover 60 x 90cm +/- 5 % combination of fliselin wadding and foil of polyethylene, gas 10 x 10cm +/- 5 % 17 nit min. 8 layers 20 pieces, stitch plates 2.5 x 12cm +/- 5 % transparent sterile waterproof polyurethane foil 10 x 12cm +/- 5 %
Hydrocolic coating from multilayer hydrocolloid with pectin, up to 1mm thick, 10 x 10cm
Hydrocolic coating from multilayer hydrocolloid with pectin, up to 1mm thick, 5 x 10cm
Hydrocolic coating from multilayer hydrocolloid with pectin, up to 1mm thick, 15 x 15cm
Hydrochloride coating from multilayer hydrocolloid with pectin 10 x 10cm
Hydrochloride coating from multilayer hydrocolloid with pectin 15 x 15cm
Hydrochloride coating from multilayer hydrocolloid with pectin 15 x 20cm
Hydro-collagen gel for wounds 15 g
Hydrophilic gas with Ag ions 15 x 15 cm
Hydrophilic gas with Ag ions 10 x 10 cm
Hydrophiber gas with reinforced strands, Ag ions, EDTA and BeCl 5 x 5 cm
Hydrophiber gas with reinforced strands, Ag ions, EDTA and BeCl 15 x 15cm
Hydrophiber gas with reinforced strands, Ag ions, EDTA and BeCl 2 x 45cm
Thin silicone polyurethane foam with 2.5 mm hydrophilic polyurethane cushion, perforated silicone layer over the entire surface, the thickness of adhesive ends 0.25 mm, incl. dimension 5.5cm x 12cm
Hydrofiber Pena adhesive 10 x 10cm
Hydrofiber Pena adhesive 12,5 x 12,5cm
Hydrofiber Pena adhesive 8 x 13cm
Hydrofiber foam non-adhesive 5 x 5cm
Hydrofiber foam non-adhesive 10 x 10cm
Hydrofiber foam non-adhesive 15 x 15cm
Hydrofiber foam non-adhesive 15 x 20cm
Hydrophilic gauze with reinforced threads and hydroxydehyde layer for operative wound 9 x 15cm
Hydrophilic gas with reinforced threads and hydroxyde layer with pectin and Ag ions for operative wound 9 x 15cm min.
Canister for the collection of extended, disposable PVC with gel and antibacterial filter capacity min. 300ml compatible with Vivana apparatus
Canister for the collection of extended, disposable PVC with gel and antibacterial filter capacity min. from 800ml compatible with Vivano devices

Inlet (port) composed of an adhesive sticker with a silicone head with a minimum of 2 openings (an opening for an outlet and an air outlet) and a two-dimensional silicone hose -yone compatible with the Vivana apparatus
Polyurethane transparent Folia with 4-part protective film, 15 x 20cm,

Set for the treatment of large-scale defects and ears with negative pressure therapy consisting of minimum 2 dark polyester foam sponges with minimum dimensions 30 x 30 x 1.6cm with pores; minimum 6 transparent transparent foils with a minimum dimension of 20 x 30 cm; port with an adhesive sticker and a silicone head with a minimum of 2 apertures (suction opening and air hole) and 2-volt silicone hose-drain compatible with Vivano device

Treatment plan for small-scale defects and ears with negative pressure therapy composed of a dark polyester foam sponge with minimum dimensions 10 x 7.5 x 3.3cm with pores; a minimum of 2 transparent foils with a minimum dimension of 15 x 20cm; port composed of an adhesive sticker and a silicone head with a minimum of 2 holes (suction opening and air hole) and a two-dimensional silicone hose-drain compatible with the Vivano device

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Statement of the economic operator proving that in the last 5 years has had an effective sentence for. participation in a criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundering;
- Certificate that a bankruptcy procedure has not been initiated by the competent body;
- Certificate that a liquidation procedure has not been initiated by the competent body;
- Certificate of paid taxes, benefits and other public duties, issued by the competent body in the country where the economic operator is registered;

- Certificate from the Registry of penalties for committed acts of crime by legal entities that the economic operator has not been issued an additional penalty of a ban on participating in procedures for a public call for bids, for awarding public procurement contracts and for contracts on public-private partnership;

- Certificate from the Registry of penalties for committed acts of crime by legal entities that the economic operator has not been issued an additional penalty of a temporary or permanent ban on performing a certain activity.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: To prove the capability of doing professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity as proof that it is registered as a legal entity for the activity related to the subject of the contract or evidence that it belongs to professional association in accordance with the regulations of the country where it is registered.
2.3.2 Certificate issued by the competent authority for the fulfillment of specific conditions for the activity prescribed under law relating to the subject matter of the contract.

— Decision that is registered in the register of legal entities for wholesale of medical devices issued by the agency for medicines and medical supplies under the Law on medicines and medical devices.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: The economic operator proves the fulfillment of the minimum requirements by submitting a decision on placing a medical device on the market in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: In order to qualify as capable of carrying out the relevant public procurement contract in terms of its technical or professional capability, the economic operator must meet the following minimum requirements:
- The economic operator must have provided for the offered goods an authorisation for placing on the market a medical device in accordance with Law on medicines and medical devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To participate on electronic auction the economic operator needs to register on ESPP (Electronic System For Public Procurement) website: www.e-nabavki.gov.mk Tender documentation, forms and information for announcement number: 27/2017 are provided on the same website.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: University clinic of pediatric surgery, st. Majka Tereza, number 17 1000, Skopje
